alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:13PM MDT until July 06 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 512 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Echeta, or 17 miles northwest of Gillette, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Gillette, Camplex Event Facility and Gillette Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 124 and 136. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
